content.text: Hi, I'm a reader who enjoys mysteries and loves to relax with a good book on a weekend. I'm in the military but I keep that separate from my family life. I live in the suburbs but my dream is to live on Mars. I have a full beard and a cat.
Hello, I am a Game of Thrones fan who worries about my mom's health. I enjoy golfing, cheeseburgers, and daily exercise. I'm on a keto diet. I talked my way out of a ticket the other day.

Oh wow! You must be a very persuasive person to talk your way out of a ticket! I would love to try golfing sometime. I've always been more of a reader than an athlete. What's your favorite thing about Game of Thrones?

I love the intricate plot and the character development. There are so many twists and turns that you never know what's going to happen next. My mom is a big fan too, but she's a little worried about how dark the show is getting.
I agree, the plot is definitely intricate! I've been watching the show with my family and we're all really invested in the characters. I'm not sure if I'm ready for the show to end!
Me neither! I'm going to be sad to see it go.
Well, it was nice chatting with you! I hope you have a great day.
